## Description
Implement API versioning and comprehensive REST/GraphQL API for third-party integrations.

## Features

### REST API
- RESTful endpoints for all major operations
- API key authentication
- Rate limiting
- Comprehensive API documentation (Swagger/OpenAPI)
- Versioned endpoints (/api/v1/...)

### Endpoints to Implement
- User management
- Test CRUD operations
- Submit answers programmatically
- Retrieve results
- Analytics data export
- Webhook support for events

### GraphQL API (Optional)
- GraphQL schema for flexible queries
- Single endpoint with type system
- Real-time subscriptions for test events

### API Features
- JWT authentication for API access
- OAuth2 for third-party apps
- Scope-based permissions
- Request/response logging
- Error handling with proper status codes
- CORS configuration

### Documentation
- Interactive API documentation (Swagger UI)
- Code examples in multiple languages
- SDKs for popular languages (JavaScript, Python)

## Use Cases
- LMS integration (Canvas, Moodle, Blackboard)
- Mobile app development
- Custom dashboards
- Data export for external analytics
- Automated test creation

## Priority
Medium

## Category
Feature - API

## Labels
enhancement, feature, api, integration
